reference_summary:
Nu-pore Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch - Blemish Patches to care for Blemish Control, scar prevention, must haves tools for skincare. korean makeup trusted cosmetics secret k-beauty. 60 Patches
nu-pore
{'Brand': 'Nu-pore', 'Item Form': 'Patch', 'Product Benefits': 'Blemish Control', 'Scent': 'Hydrocolloid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 1.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '780707702413'}
I tend to breakout a lot especially week prior to menstrual period. These pimple patches do a great job in minimizing pimple size and inflammation. I put it on at night before bed and when I wake up in the morning, the pimple is almost gone. It has good adhesion, mine did not come off during sleep. I definitely recommend.
Helps minimize inflammation
Eggplant Clearing Cleansing Oil Pad 60 pads, Makeup remover pad. Exfoliating. Simple easy quick wipe. Moisturizing cleansing oil pad
PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN
{'Brand': 'PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 3.82 x 2.72 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
Love these cleansing pads. I typically use fragrance free body oil to remove eye makeup, but was happy to see same thing in a pad. I was worried it would irritate the eyes, but it didn't! I used one pad for both eyes to remove waterproof mascara and eyeliner. No irritation and it took everything off! Definitely recommend!
Removes stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara!
Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz
Gryph & IvyRose
{'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'}
This is my third purchase from this brand! I got their shampoo/body wash and conditioner. Their products are amazing and I love the natural ingredients! Lotion is very hydrating for kids skin and has a nice scent. Quick absorbing and leaves skin feeling very soft and smooth. Definitely recommend!
Great natural lotion for kids
Large Silk Scrunchies For Hair - Tara Sartoria Artisan Handmade
Tara Sartoria
{'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Tara Sartoria', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.37 x 3.9 x 0.71 inches; 1.09 Ounces'}
These are very beautiful and feel really nice. They do good job holding my medium thick hair. Does not pull on hair. Makes great gift too!
Beautiful and soft
AllWell Beauty | Moisturizing Exfoliating Botanical Radiant Face and Body Mask | With Red Maple, Safflower, & Lavender | Made in the USA | Vegan, Cruelty-Free | 5 Count, 0.5 Fl. Oz. Travel Packs
AllWell AllOver
{'Brand': 'AllWell AllOver', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Material Type Free': 'Phthalates', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.26 x 2.6 x 1.06 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '850012824268'}
This mask has helped my skin feel soo soft and smooth. It does an excellent job hydrating the skin that it feels so nice. I love that it comes in individual packets as it makes it easier for travel. It also doesn't have funky smell like others I have tried in past, this is important to me. I definitely would recommend!
Love it!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

**Skincare Preferences:** The user continues to prioritize managing acne and blemish control while emphasizing hydration for sensitive skin. Recent interactions reflect an expanding interest in lightweight sunscreen options that provide broad-spectrum protection without leaving a white cast, further enhancing their skincare routine.

**Treatment Methods:** In addition to topical solutions and hydrating masks, the user is now incorporating effective sun protection into their routine, favoring products that maintain skin sensitivity and deliver a smooth, non-greasy finish, suitable for layering under makeup.

**Product Characteristics:** The emphasis on natural, cruelty-free, and family-friendly ingredients remains strong. The user continues to favor products that avoid irritating components and prioritize effective hydration without harsh chemicals, aligning well with their sensitive skin needs.

**Purchase Behavior:** While K-beauty is a mainstay, the user shows increasing interest in innovative brands that offer botanical and vegan formulations, as well as multi-functional products for added convenience. Their selection reflects a desire for practicality and aesthetics in skincare accessories.

**Overall Trends:** The user maintains a holistic approach to skincare, balancing acne management with hydration and sun protection. Their recent purchases indicate a commitment to quality, convenience, and a sophisticated self-care experience, showcasing an evolving interest in easy-to-use products that cater to individual and family needs while enhancing overall skin health.
